title: This pocket-sized dock transforms your laptop into an entire workstation
description: Accell's USB-C Multiport adapter can serve as the heart of a multi-monitor desk setup when you're home and fit in a pocket when you're on the road.

title: Small businesses need more help. Here are four ways to get it
description: Tough economic conditions are making it hard for small business owners. Here's how you can help your SMB to not only survive but to thrive.

title: 8 things you can do with Linux that you can't do with MacOS or Windows
description: Why should you try Linux? This is why.

title: Hancom CEO Kim Yeonsu aims to rally developers, confident to leave mark on global SaaS market
description: The leader of one of South Korea's homegrown software companies wants the Hancom brand to become global. To achieve this, she is seeking the help of developers worldwide.
